name: Chicago Pizza
desc: The pan in which it is baked gives the pizza its characteristically high edge which provides ample space for large amounts of cheese and a chunky tomato sauce.

name: Neopolitan Pizza
desc: TThis style of pizza is prepared with simple fresh ingredients; a basic dough, raw tomatoes, fresh mozzarella cheese, fresh basil and olive oil. A fantastic original pizza

name: New York Pizza
desc: New York style pizza has slices that are large and wide with a thin crust this is foldable yet crispy. It is traditionally topped with tomato sauce and mozzarella cheese.

name: Sicilian Pizza
desc: Traditional Sicilian pizza is often thick crusted and rectangular and topped with onions, anchovies, tomatoes, herbs and strong cheese such as caciocavallo and toma
